member.name: T:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.VisualStudio.Protocol.Frontend.Debugger.IVsDebuggerInterop
member.summary: Protocol component to interact with Visual Studio's debugger interface.

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.VisualStudio.Protocol.Frontend.Debugger.IVsDebuggerInterop.QueryExpressionsType(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Queries actual type of provided expression.
member.param: the expression or the name of the local variable
whether to allow debugger to evaluate provided expression.
Whether to allow side effects evaluation.

The document location in context of which the calculations should be performed. If currently selected frame does not correspond to provided document's location the result will be always null. You can disable this check by providing null to this parameter>
member.returns: FQN of the provided type with type arguments in < and >

member.name: M:JetBrains.PsiFeatures.VisualStudio.Protocol.Frontend.Debugger.IVsDebuggerInterop.GetAllowImplicitEvaluation
member.summary: Whether implicit property and function evaluation is enabled on frontend.
